question: You had an appointment with the bank and now you realized that you can't make it for that .write a letter to the manager-Give details about your appointment and dates.-Explain the reason why you cannot make it.-Ask for other dates.
text: This letter is being written to you in regards to my appointment with your bank that ,unfortunately I could not make it this time due to some family issue.
I Manvir Kaur have booked a meeting with you for 10 November at 10 am . It was regarding the home loan scheme. My meeting was with Mr Verma from the home loan department.

I would like to tell you that I am not able to attend this discussion as my grandfather got a heart attack and he is admitted  to the Intensive care unit in the hospital. In this situation , I could not able to think of something else apart from their health.

I really want to discuss my home loan options with you as my plan for buying a house is fixed. It would be nice of you if you could defer our meeting till next month . Then, I will be free from all personal matters.
I hope you will understand my plight. Sorry for causing you any inconvenience .
